features: HIGH DEFINITION DOUBLE SIDED MIRROR: 1 side is high definition normal mirror with no magnification, no distortion, and the other side is 15x magnification mirror.

15X MAGNIFYING MIRROR: It is very clear and not distorted. Great for checking your face close up. Great for putting on makeup and tweezing those unwanted facial hairs. It helps you with make up, face care ect.
MUTI-USE DESIGN: Flexible foldaway handle which can rotate multiple angles(with a moderate damping feel), can be used as a hand mirror, tabletop mirror, and hanging mirror.
GREAT FOR TRAVEL MIRROR: It is compact and will be great for traveling as it folds and is not too big. Mirror is two way mirror-easy to pack. Perfect size for traveling.
BLACK & STREAM SHAPE: Classic black color & modern rounded mirror, steadiness when you hold it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Color: Black | Size: 9.6"x5.5". Diameter (4.8 in. viewing area) A premium Multi-function mirror waiting for you. As a Handheld Vanity Makeup Mirror, Premium Quality Handle with ergonomic design and proper length ensures a silky and comfortable grip feeling. easy to carry and use. As a desktop makeup mirror, You can adjust the mirror to suitable angle for great viewing. As a Wall-Mounted Mirror (shower mirror), Mirror can hang onto a wall or held on the handle and is excellent for salon and shaving. As a Travel Mirror, When you folded the handheld mirror you can take it anywhere. 1X 15X Double Side Mirror A side is a flat mirror and the other side is a 15x magnifying glass. Double Side Mirror can help you look perfect with each detail and angle taken care-of. Specification: Material: ABS+Glass Weight: 190g / 6.7 Oz What's InThe Box: 1X Black Magnifying Handheld Mirror

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a surprisingly great little mirror
reviews.reviewText: I was worried it was going to be too small... or just one more super cheaply made mirror with a frustratingly poor design like so many others I've owned throughout the past twenty years or so. This one is on the small side, but don't let that fool you, it's still within the optimally functional range, so it's all good. The handle is sturdy and adjustable so as to be easily used as both a handheld and a countertop mirror. The grippy soft material gives it an overall quality feel that is substantial and altgough it is easily adjustable, it's not loose or floppy in any respect. The hinges have the perfect resistance, it stays where you want it, period. It can be easily hung on a hook out of the way for storage or you can adjust it and use it in an additional hands free mode off the countertop saving space. As I mentioned earlier, I was concerned over the size, especially since I tend to love a bigger mirror, it's honestly been just the right size for every use I've needed it for, plus it can reasonably fit in your luggage for travel. I guess those big mirrors were just compensating for what they lacked in functionality and design. It's been years since I've had a handheld mirror I've felt so good about, I'm genuinely happy I didn't let my reservations prevent me from owning and loving this great new addition to my routine

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: Great folding dual side mirror. Perfect for travel. A tad small but serves the purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little mirror
reviews.reviewText: My bird broke my mirror I bought at Walmart, pushed it right off the bathroom counter and it cracked on the floor. I decided to buy one off of Amazon (more choices than Walmart) I saw that this one had a pretty strong magnifying side. The magnified side let's you get up close and personal with your face. I love the matt texture on the frame and handle, it gives it an elegant look. Love how the handle can be folded as well. I leave it on my bathroom counter top folded. This would be my go to mirror if I needed another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 15X Magnification is great.
reviews.reviewText: Small but not too small. Great for traveling. I love the 15X for a close up when trimming mustache, and guy's, do you know how gross it it to see hair coming out of a person's nose? It might be you! Easy to cut them with this mirror because sometimes the electric nose hair trimmer doesn't get them all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Little Mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I love this little mirror. My last one (different brand) broke at the base and I needed one that would stand on its own. Also, my old one was only 10x magnification and this one is, I believe 15x. Makes a difference for us middle aged people who are starting to have eyesight problems! Haha. Anyway, great purchase, great little mirror!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to hold onto but smells mildew-y
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my husband, who primarily uses for shaving his head. It is easy to hold onto and I like the fact that it will stand independently. I did start to notice over the past week or so that when it gets wet, water must be getting stuck behind the mirrors because it will smell like mildew
